message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have available is not just any item; it holds immense value to us and, I believe, to you as well. Given its significance, I am offering you the chance to acquire this product at a special price tailored to recognize its importance to you. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a transaction price of $1,300,000. This offer aims to strike a balance between fair market value and mutual benefit. I look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a transaction that meets our expectations and aligns with your interests. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
